mapper.insert: insert into CLIMATE_SECTION (ID, SECTION_NAME, SECTION_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, ELEVATION, ADDRESS, AIR_PRESSURE_GAUGE_ELEVATION, WIND_SPEED_GAUGE_HEIGHT, OBSERVE_PLATFORM_HEIGHT, SECTION_LEADER, TEMPERATURE_MONITOR, RAIN_MONITOR, WET_MONITOR, POWER_STATION_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{latitude,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{elevation,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{airPressureGaugeElevation,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{windSpeedGaugeHeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{observePlatformHeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sectionLeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperatureMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{rainMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{wetMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{powerStationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update CLIMATE_SECTION set SECTION_NAME = #{sectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECTION_CODE = #{sectionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ELEVATION = #{elevation,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AIR_PRESSURE_GAUGE_ELEVATION = #{airPressureGaugeElevation,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WIND_SPEED_GAUGE_HEIGHT = #{windSpeedGaugeHeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, OBSERVE_PLATFORM_HEIGHT = #{observePlatformHeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SECTION_LEADER = #{sectionLeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPERATURE_MONITOR = #{temperatureMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, RAIN_MONITOR = #{rainMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WET_MONITOR = #{wetMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, POWER_STATION_ID = #{powerStationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SECTION_NAME, SECTION_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, ELEVATION, ADDRESS, AIR_PRESSURE_GAUGE_ELEVATION, WIND_SPEED_GAUGE_HEIGHT, OBSERVE_PLATFORM_HEIGHT, SECTION_LEADER, TEMPERATURE_MONITOR, RAIN_MONITOR, WET_MONITOR, POWER_STATION_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from CLIMATE_SECTION where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, SECTION_NAME, SECTION_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, ELEVATION, ADDRESS, AIR_PRESSURE_GAUGE_ELEVATION, WIND_SPEED_GAUGE_HEIGHT, OBSERVE_PLATFORM_HEIGHT, SECTION_LEADER, TEMPERATURE_MONITOR, RAIN_MONITOR, WET_MONITOR, POWER_STATION_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from CLIMATE_SECTION
